sub_title: Brand and Communications Intern at EVBox | ⚡️Powering a sustainable future⚡️
summary:
If I only have 3 words to describe myself, that would be: Aquarius, energetic and thoughtful. 

Doesn’t matter how knowledgeable you are in astrology, all you need to know about Aquarius is that the sign is highly associated with being creative, exceptional and self-reliant. As an international student in Media and Communication, I live by and perform those characteristics everyday. I seek every opportunity to develop, challenge myself and widen my horizon because for me “to define is to limit” (Oscar Wilde).

As the word energetic already explained itself, whenever and wherever, you will always find me as a girl who has a smile on her face and a lot of energy. I believe a positive attitude is the most important driving force to accomplish almost anything, therefore, I also want to radiate with people around me.

Lastly, as an oldest sister in the family, an international student who lives in an international environment, a representation of generation Z in a technological world, the word thoughtful has a meaningful impact on me. More than just being nice to people, thoughtful means to genuinely care and be aware of our surroundings.

profile_positions.description:
To build a sustainable future, EVBox empowers businesses and drivers to embrace electric mobility. 

EVBox’s charging solutions lay the foundations for a world where electric mobility is the new normal by giving EV drivers the ability to charge with confidence, allowing businesses to easily enter the market and scale their offering as demand grows, and evolving with the rapid pace of innovation. 

Founded in 2010, EVBox is now a market leader in electric vehicle charging infrastructure (EVSE) who has delivered over 500,000 charging ports to partners and customers globally. 

As a Brand and Communication Intern, I will be part of 2 teams: Brand & Customer Communication and Corporate Communication. Regarding Brand & Customer Communication, my main task is to lead a project to enhance EVBox's new branding image among EVBoxers. The project includes activities such as making a tutorial to help people update their LinkedIn profile with branded assets (new logo, banner,...), design a poster or a series of workshops/webinars to let employees understand the meaning behind the new brand logo. At the same time, I will also assist other members in the team with their tasks, such as managing EVBox's Instagram page. 

Within the Corporate Communication team, my main task is to take care of the internal communication channels within the company (e.g., newsletters, websites,..). Abig part of my internship time was dedicated to building a new company Intranet on Microsoft. I have helped the teamforming the Intranet and conductiong tutorial for backend users.
profile_positions.title: Brand and Communications Intern

profile_positions.description:
AIESEC is an international youth-run and led, non-governmental and non-profit organisation with the mission "to fulfils humankinds potential by developing leadership through youth by youth." AIESEC operates in 127 countries spread over the globe and has over 40.000 members. 

As a Manager of Out Going Talent team, I assist participants from the Netherlands finding and doing a exchange intern in another country. Giving CV's feedback, doing mock interview are also part of my job in order to prepare the participate for their intern journey.
profile_positions.title: Out Going Global Talent Manager

volunteer_experiences.description:
The project consists of 2 month of training and 2 actual weeks in Taichung, Taiwan. With a mission of teaching Taiwanese’s  students Vietnamese as well as spreading the Vietnamese culture to the neighbors, all the students have to work with not only their students  but also with corresponding Taiwanese partners to carry out a suitable teaching method during the project time. 

The Camp has excellently brought different cultures together, making the students understand more about  their country as well as help them to develop different skills such as problem – solving, communication and time management.

volunteer_experiences.role: Student Representative, 10th BIHS Global Forum "Beyond Conflict Toward Peace"
volunteer_experiences.description: A team of 8 students and 1 teachers flew to Korea for one week with the mission of delivering a speech relating to how the power  of individual can navigate conflicts toward the international synergy and peace. Beside the main purpose, the forum is not only a place for us to exchange culture with other countries in the world, but it also serves as an opportunity for us, who represents the young Vietnamese  generation to recognize ourselves in an international environment
